DOC.detailed_description: Coronary artery dissection contraindication use rotational atherectomy , since rotational atherectomy may propagate coronary dissection . In presence coronary dissection , conservative management suggest approximately 4 week permit dissection heal prior treatment rotational atherectomy . However , lot patient frequent angina attack patient develop serious complication include abrupt vessel closure period . Thus , immediate strategy cope coronary dissection induce balloon dilation need early recovery patient . The present study perform compare safety efficacy immediate RA delay RA treatment nondilatable calcified lesion complicate coronary dissection .
